sections.heading: Sections, how construed.Sections 25-413 to 25-417 shall be so construed as to effectuate their general purpose to make uniform the law of those states which enact them
25-413 to 25-417 shall be so construed as to effectuate their general purpose to make uniform the law of those states which enact them.
sections.text: 25-413 to 25-417 shall be so construed as to effectuate their general purpose to make uniform the law of those states which enact them.
